title.rendered: Jasmine Searches House, Confronts Gino Over Keepsakes on 90 Day Fiance (Recap)

content.rendered:
Last week’s 90 Day Fiance shifted from meeting Gino’s family to Jasmine erupting with suspicion and tears.

Season 10, Episode 7 picks up where we left off — with Jasmine wandering around and crying in the cold.

Even if Gino convinces her that the cheating that she imagined him doing was imaginary,
